    • Method Detail

      • calculateLegalMoves

        public java.util.Collection<Move> calculateLegalMoves(Board board)
        Check if tile coordinate is valid and if it's exception. If it is, apply offset. If it's exception, break out. Check again if coordinates valid and then check if the destination tile's occupied. If tile's occupied by enemy, use attack move and if not, use major move. After encountering another piece, break out of loop.
        Specified by:
        calculateLegalMoves in class Piece
        Parameters:
        board - current game game board
        Returns:
        Collection of legal moves.
